title.rendered: TODAY AT 9AM: Abrams Campaign Held Zoom Press Conference Calling Out Brian Kemp for Pushing Opponent Fundraising Ban

content.rendered:
ATLANTA – Today, February 14 at 9AM, the Abrams for Governor campaign held a Zoom press conference calling out Brian Kemp after his state senate allies announced a plan to push to Kemp’s desk a bill that would stop fundraising for months by Kemp’s challengers from all parties. Abrams Campaign Manager Lauren Groh-Wargo, Senior Communications Advisor Seth Bringman, Deputy Finance Director Dom Kelly, and retired teacher and monthly donor Jan Cunningham joined today to discuss how the proposed ban will silence supporters of Kemp’s opponents and give him an intended unfair advantage.

See live zoom press conference here.

Full list of speakers:
Lauren Groh Wargo, Campaign Manager
Seth Bringman, Senior Communications Advisor
Dom Kelly, Deputy Finance Director
Jan Cunningham, retired teacher and monthly donor

###
